CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Gouttière"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Ortho"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"PEI, Cire"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Réparations"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Pilier"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Barre")), SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( UPPER(TEXT(Ligne__r.Arcade__c )) , "BAS", "LOW 下"),"HAUT","UP 上"),"ET","+") ,"")
CustomField.label: ProdCol2A
